title: Unforgivable Lust & Fire
description: This edition is out of print!Keera was thrown into a life of independence at a young age after both her parents died in a tragic accident. Her childhood friends and grandparents helped her through the devastating loss. Living a lonely life, she dreams of having a passionate relationship like her parents had, but will she ever let a man into her life? Keera lost trust in men, still damaged from when she was almost raped as a teenager by a friend. Is he? Or will someone new come into her life igniting the flame of desire?
author: Shay Lee Soleil
